title: I created a GD drinking game.
body:
You read:
riot= 1 sip
rito=2 sips
troll= 1 big gulp
weeaboo= finish the drink
weebs= get a new drink, regardless if you just opened one.
cheese= 1 sip
toxic= 5 second chug.
anime= 1 sip

by the end of skimming the titles you'll be passed out and about to die from alcohol poisoning....


on second thought, no GD drinking games.
